column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=DS : If you could only choose one of these careers , what would you most want to go with ?
#Text=EB :
#Text=In temperament , I 'm best suited to the writing , but it is n't what I enjoy the most .
#Text=I mean , I really enjoy acting , because it 's a lot of fun .
#Text=But there 's a certain self-involvement that 's required with acting , and a certain thick skin that I just do n't have .
#Text=I 'm much more a writer , because I can have a homebody quality , and I can be in the house ; I can be away from people .
#Text=I have sort of a problem in that I like people a lot , and I really hate people , and so it 's kind of difficult to decide where I 'm at on any given day .
#Text=How Bogosian approaches his writing

#Text=DS : When you tackled your first novel , was there ever a time when you were like , ' I do n't even know how people get an entire novel out of their heads , ' and you had to actually sit down and plot it ?
#Text=How did you approach your first novel ?
#Text=EB :
#Text=Well , my first prose book was n't a novel ; it 's a novella called , Notes from the Underground .
#Text=The way I did that -- and this is a long time ago -- I wrote it by creating diary entries and just filling them in every day .
#Text=So every day , I would give myself the assignment of writing a diary entry for this character .

#Text=And I 'd say that that 's pretty much the easiest way to sit down and write a book , because you say to yourself every day , " I 'm going to write one of these things , " and one day it 'll be long , and another day it 'll be short .
#Text=I eventually found out what that character was about .
#Text=My current book I 'm writing now is also written in journal entry form , although in a much more complex way .
#Text=When I sat down to write Mall , which was really my first novel , I wrote it by understanding that I 'm not the most sophisticated prose writer .
#Text=I had been writing a lot of screenplays and even some television , so I had learned a lot about how to tell a story .
#Text=I decided to create a very clear spine on which to hang a lot of things , a very clear arc .
#Text=That arc was kind of a thriller .
#Text=Mall
#Text=is about a guy who 's a disgruntled employee and he goes to a shopping mall to shoot the place up .
#Text=And it was just kind of strange , because since I 've written this book this keeps happening !
#Text=This happened a few days ago .
#Text=DS : I saw that .
